high_priority_tasks.title: Update ChatGPT Selectors for Current UI
high_priority_tasks.description: Inspect ChatGPT page using browser dev tools to identify correct textarea and send button selectors, then update TheaBrowserService
acceptance_criteria: Thea automation can find and interact with ChatGPT input elements
Full prompt submission and response retrieval working

high_priority_tasks.title: Test Complete Thea Automation Workflow
high_priority_tasks.description: Test the full Thea prompt submission and response retrieval workflow with the trading robot report
acceptance_criteria: Trading robot report prompt submitted successfully
Thea response received and saved to file
No automation errors in the process

medium_priority_tasks.title: Document ChatGPT Selector Maintenance Procedures
medium_priority_tasks.description: Create documentation for maintaining ChatGPT selectors when UI changes occur
acceptance_criteria: Tools for diagnosing selector issues documented

medium_priority_tasks.title: Validate Auto-Healing Selector System
medium_priority_tasks.description: Test the auto-healing selector system with different scenarios to ensure it works correctly
deliverables: Auto-healing system tested with multiple selector scenarios
acceptance_criteria: Auto-healing system correctly prioritizes working selectors
Fallback methods work when primary selectors fail
Success rates are properly tracked and cached

low_priority_tasks.title: Implement Infrastructure Health Monitoring
low_priority_tasks.description: Create monitoring for disk space and other infrastructure health metrics to prevent future automation failures
acceptance_criteria: Low disk space warnings before automation fails

context_notes.session_summary: Successfully established infrastructure foundation for Thea automation with auto-healing selector system. Resolved disk space crisis and implemented comprehensive browser automation resilience patterns.
context_notes.critical_carryover: ChatGPT selectors need updating to match current UI - this is the final blocker for complete Thea automation functionality.
context_notes.coordination_needed: May need to coordinate with Captain or other agents if ChatGPT access requires specific permissions or if UI changes affect other automation.
context_notes.risks: ChatGPT UI changes frequently - selector maintenance will be ongoing requirement.

recommended_session_focus: Complete ChatGPT selector updates and test full Thea automation workflow
success_criteria: Thea automation fully functional for prompt submission and response retrieval
